dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 2394 IH: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to include fuel cells using electromechanical processes for purposes of the energy tax credit.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Stivers (for himself, Ms. Speier, and Mr. Reed) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to include fuel cells using electromechanical processes for purposes of the energy tax credit.

section.header: Including fuel cells using electromechanical processes for purposes of the energy tax credit

subsection.text: Paragraph (1) of section 48(c) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (A)(i), by inserting or electromechanical after electrochemical, and

subparagraph.text: by inserting , or linear generator assembly, after a fuel cell stack assembly, and
by inserting or electromechanical after electrochemical.

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply to property placed in service after the date of the enactment of this Act.
